channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: FBI searches home of former Trump adviser John Bolton
item.description: The FBI said its search of Bolton's home was authorized by a court, but declined to provide further details. Bolton is a frequent critic of the presid...

item.title: U.N.-backed panel confirms famine in Gaza. And, DOJ to send Congress some Epstein docs
item.description: A U.N.-backed panel of experts has declared that northern Gaza is suffering from famine. And, the DOJ is expected to release to Congress the first wav...

item.title: Famine confirmed in northern Gaza, says U.N.-backed agency
item.description: Famine has been officially declared in northern Gaza, a U.N.-backed group warns — marking the first such confirmation in the Middle East.

item.title: These programs help poor students with college. Trump wants to pull the funding
item.description: For 60 years, TRIO has helped millions of people along the path to a degree, but the administration says it is no longer needed.

item.title: Thai court acquits ex-Prime Minister Thaksin Shinawatra of royal defamation charge

item.title: OpenAI announces New Delhi office as it expands footprint in India
item.description: OpenAI has started hiring in India as it looks to expand its presence in the fast-growing South Asian tech market.

item.title: How to Invest in Real Estate on a Middle-Class Salary ($70K or Less)
item.description: Do you make a middle-class income ($70,000 or less) per year and want to invest in real estate? This is how you do it. You don’t need a six-figure sal...

item.title: I’ve Got $10K and No Job: How Do I Start Investing? (Rookie Reply)

item.title: AP analysis shows Texas and California redistricting efforts could mess with rare partisan balance
item.description: Moves by Texas Republicans and California Democrats to redraw their U.S. House districts could disrupt a rare partisan balance in American politics.

item.title: Waymo approved to start autonomous vehicle testing in New York City
item.description: It's the first permit of its kind, and a crucial step along the path toward launching a true robotaxi service in the Big Apple.

item.title: OpenAI lawyers question Meta’s role in Elon Musk’s $97B takeover bid
item.description: OpenAI says that Elon Musk met with Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg to discuss a $97 billion takeover bid of the ChatGPT-maker.

item.title: Anduril, Blue Origin to study how to transport cargo from orbit to Earth for the Pentagon
item.description: Blue Origin and Anduril notched small contracts that could revolutionize how the Pentagon transports cargo.
